thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Sharon Zerkel
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Sharon Zerkel

author: Sharon Zerkel
title: Sharon Zerkel
text: All emails, questions, and concerns were answered in a very timely manner. Quickly, thoroughly, professionally and yet in a friendly tone. The Bleuette arrived just as described! Excellent packaging. I will definitely do business with Debra Borrud of Au Nain Bleu II again. Quality items and quality care.
